title: Blueblah the Sleepy Raccoon: A story about the importance of participating, and overcoming self-doubt and anxiety.
description: Blueblah is a raccoon who is afraid of trying things out. One day as he is taking one of his usual naps, he is awakened by a group of raccoons that help him realize that being great at something does not come automatically, but that practice, participation and patience are important keys to success. This book comes with a unique exercise for you and your child to practice the teachings the book has to offer.
author: Monica Dumont
